column4: i think i'll install ubuntu, but can someone help me with my prob with debian? i installed debian, installed the musts with tasksel, i installed the ati vga module (fglrx), and compiled the last kernel... now trying to startx (xserver-xfree86) it says that the module of vga (either fglrx and vesa same problem)
install ubuntu. chances are high it will work out of the box
